headline: PTC (PTC): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q4 Earnings?
summary: Since September 2024, PTC has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 4.7% while floating around $160.81. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 1.5% gain during that period.
